heading: # Ratings
headingText: The rating component is a specialized but crucial piece in building user widgets. Collecting user feedback via ratings is a simple analytic that can provide a lot of feedback to your product or application.

usage.desc: The `v-rating` component provides a simple interface for gathering user feedback.

sizes.heading: ### Size variants
sizes.desc: Utilize the same sizing classes available in `v-icon` or provide your own with the **size** prop.

length.heading: ### Custom length
length.desc: Sometimes an application will call for a customized implementation. Easily change length or displayed icons.

increments.heading: ### Incremented
increments.desc: A rating can have 3 defined icons, **full-icon**, **half-icon** (with the **half-increments** prop) and **empty-icon**.

slots.heading: ### Slots
slots.desc: Slots are provided to give you even more freedom in how you display the rating.

card.heading: ### Card ratings
card.desc: The rating component pairs well with products allowing you to gather and display customer feedback.

advanced.heading: ### Advanced usage
advanced.desc: The `v-rating` component fits right in with existing components. Build truly complex examples with rich features and beautiful designs.

colors.heading: ### Colors
colors.desc: The `v-rating` component can be colored as you want, you can set both selected and not selected colors.

props.clearable: Allows for the component to be cleared. Triggers when the icon containing the current value is clicked.
props.halfIcon: The icon displayed when half (requires **half-increments** prop)
props.halfIncrements: Allows the selection of half increments
props.hover: Provides visual feedback when hovering over icons
props.length: The amount of ratings to show
props.readonly: Removes all hover effects and pointer events

events.input: Emits the rating number when this value changes
